name: Magne-Burst
description:
My submission for LM0D Beginners Game Jam #14

Theme: "Nothing"

Start with nothing, no weapons, no abilities. Play as a magnet tasked with collecting needles to pop balloons. Dodge blackholes and fight the WIZARD. After defeating him, you will be sent back to the beginning with nothing , except this time you have a new ability. But beware, everytime you get stronger, the enemies will too.

The game is playable with a touchpad but is best played with a mouse.

Music: 

Made by Mitchell Miller
